p: To construct a phylogenetic analysis of known henipaviruses and henipavirus-like viruses globally and other known Paramyxovirinae, sequences of a 559 bp segment of the polymerase gene were obtained from GenBank ( Supplementary Table S3). Phylogenetic trees from these sequences and of viral sequences from urine samples analysed in this study were constructed using MRBAYES under the GTR+I+G model.
